channel.title: Getting server online for others to play - Help Please
channel.description: I am running a hamachi server cause it's easier. I'm running hamachi, uTorrent, and server all at once. It's not letting me put it online. Any suggestions?

item.title: Getting server online for others to play - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:

im having the same problem and people dont really help that much here, so if u find out could you please hit me up. same goes for me, if i find out ill let u know

item.title: Getting server online for others to play - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @k1_blade k1 blade
item.description:
@k1_blade wrote:

I’ve also tried done portforwarding and have NO-IP. But it don’t work either.
I don’t know what it is.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting server online for others to play - Help Please

item.title: Getting server online for others to play - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @apathypvp apathypvp
item.description:
@apathypvp wrote:

Tbh, many people do not like hamachi or utorrent. I suggest portforwarding through your router or etc and then using a no-ip to let others connect through your client because I do not really know how to deal with utorrent, if you need help doing that you could always send me a private message or search the tutorials section of this forum.

Although, if you choose not to do that. You must set your hamachi ip to the ip of your client and your players must be connected to your hamachi network at all times, it would also be a good idea to leave your hamachi network on all the time.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting server online for others to play - Help Please
